name: Right-Hand Partners
tag_list: venture-capital, vc, entrepreneur, fundraising, recruiting, recruiter, executive-recruiter
overview:
Right-Hand Partners (RHP) is a trusted conduit to reach the VC community and recruiting partner for the startup community.

RHP has helped 38 companies raise over $170M since 2001 and is now extending their vast high quality network of serial entrepreneurs, engineers, manager and CXOs to the startup community.

RHP has relationships with hundreds of IT focused venture capitalists representing over 150 VC firms mostly in the Silicon Valley (SV).
